item.title: ARMK
item.description: score:1194 Chances: Aramark is introducing innovative ordering technologies and food concepts for college campuses, aiming to engage and ground students through dining programs tailored to industry and campus-specific data. The company’s partnership with BLK & Bold, the first Black-owned nationally distributed coffee brand, expands its coffee offerings to Aramark Refreshments clients, potentially boosting revenue and customer engagement.
